author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Place the rhubarb and the 1 tbsp sugar in a bowl in the microwave and cook on high for two minutes. Mix together the flour, vanilla seeds, 85g/3oz sugar and eggs in a food processor. Place the rhubarb in a small frying pan.  Pour over the batter and bake in the oven for ten minutes. Serve with double cream.
ingredients: 1 rhubarb stalk, chopped,  1 tbsp sugar,  200g/7oz self-raising flour,  1 vanilla pod, seeds only,  85g/3oz caster sugar,  2 free-range eggs,  double cream, for serving
